review.title: “never graduated from startup”
review.pros: Pros – Salaries are bit above average. Freedom to take initiatives but ideas are hadly accepted. As long as you are on a project life is cool as company does not interfere
review.cons: Cons – Sloppy management, no reviews, no planning, New ideas are heard but never accepted or impmented, managment by crisis philosphy. Few documented process which are implemented cases by case basis
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Come ot of the startup mode, give middle management responsibilities and authority. Back your works and decisions. Implement policies and procedures.
